title: Mariah Carey shares love for Stranger Things' Millie Bobby Brown
text:
Mariah Carey has shared her love for Stranger Things and Millie Bobby Brown (Picture: Getty/Netflix)

Stranger Things bosses had their prayers answered by none other than Mariah Carey, after the superstar blessed the show with her (and her kids’) support for star Millie Bobby Brown.

A tweet from the official Twitter account of the Stranger Things writers room asked one simple question: ‘Any Millie Bobby Brown fans in the house?’

Of course, the Eleven actress is quite popular with fans of the sci-fi show, so there was a big reaction. But one reply we think the writers didn’t bet on was from the Queen of Christmas herself, Mariah.

Yes!! My kids are OBSESSED with her!!! https://t.co/YJN0P3atgD — Mariah Carey (@MariahCarey) October 10, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Yes!!’ the Touch my Body hitmaker responded. ‘My kids are OBSESSED with her!!!’

Which is exactly the kind of response you hope for, right?

The writers of the hit Netflix show also came up with the perfect response to the shout out, and we couldn’t agree more with the statement.

Do you think Mariah binged all of season 3 in one day? We like to think so (Picture: Netflix)

we love legends supporting legends — Stranger Writers (@strangerwriters) October 10, 2019

Now that we know that Mimi and her kids are fans of the show, we wonder what their reaction was to the exciting news that the streaming sensation has been renewed for a fourth season.

We also want to know Mariah’s theories on what happened to Hopper at the end of season three, or what she thinks of this mind-blowing explanation shared by one fan.

Stranger Things seasons 1-3 are available to stream now on Netflix.
